humanum_full_description_en:
From the " Wo ", " ping " sound, the original meaning of the amount of light and heavy equipment, with " known ." "Guangyun‧ Zhengyun": "It is called a scale." "Wei Shu‧Zhang Puhui Biography": "According to today's official official scale, it is wide and long, and it is discounted to the person who pays the salary."

" Weighing " is the same as " weighing ", which can indicate the weight of a weighing object. Tang Jiadao "Gift to Niu Shanren": "Chisel stone to raise bees and stop buying honey, sit on mountain and weigh medicine to win stars."

" Scale " can also mean weighing and weighing. Tang Niu Sengru "Wen Ji Shendao Stele": "Heavenly generals weigh his virtues and become his family."

" Scale " is an ancient measure word that means fifteen catties. "Kong Congzi‧ Heng": "Ten Jin is the balance, half of the balance is the scale, and the second is the Jun."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " Wo ", " ping " sound, the original meaning of the amount of light and heavy appliances.
humanum_full_description:
從「禾」，「平」聲，本義為量輕重的器具，同「稱」。《廣韻‧證韻》：「稱，俗作秤。」《魏書‧張普惠傳》：「依今官度官秤計其斤兩，廣長，折給請俸之人。」

　　「秤」同於「稱」，可表示用秤量物之輕重。唐賈島〈贈牛山人〉：「鑿石養蜂休買蜜，坐山秤藥不爭星。」

　　「秤」還能表示權衡、衡量。唐牛僧孺〈溫佶神道碑〉：「天將秤其德而世其家。」

　　「秤」古作量詞，表示十五斤。《孔叢子‧衡》：「斤十謂之衡，衡有半謂之秤，秤二謂之鈞。」
humanum_short_description: 從「禾」，「平」聲，本義為量輕重的器具。

秤字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　秤； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页851第28
【廣韻】昌孕切，稱去聲。正斤兩也。【古之奇縣令箴】如秤之平。【太平御覽】諸葛亮曰：我心如秤，不能爲人低昂。又姚崇有執秤誡。　又數名。【小爾雅】斤十謂之衡，衡有半謂之秤，秤二謂之鈞。　【廣韻】俗稱字。
